title: BRIEF-Datatec Says HY HEPS Expected To Be Between 2.0 And 2.5 US Cents Versus 0.7 US Cents
text:
BRIEF-Datatec Says HY HEPS Expected To Be Between 2.0 And 2.5 US Cents Versus 0.7 US Cents

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 03, 2019 08:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Datatec Says HY HEPS Expected To Be Between 2.0 And 2.5 US Cents Versus 0.7 US Cents Oct 3 (Reuters) - Datatec Ltd : * EXPECTS FOR H1 FY20 ALL EPS METRICS WILL BE MORE THAN 20% HIGHER THAN REPORTED EARNINGS FOR H1 FY19 * HY UNDERLYING EPS IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 5.0 AND 5.5 US CENTS (H1 FY19: 3.6 US CENTS) * HY HEPS IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 2.0 AND 2.5 US CENTS (H1 FY19: 0.7 US CENTS)

BRIEF-Datatec Says HY HEPS Expected To Be Between 2.0 And 2.5 US Cents Versus 0.7 US Cents
